event.title: slowed down after that, but in recent years

data.event: Its development slowed down after that, but in recent years the town has begun developing rapidly again.

event.title: 1937, Taiping was the capital of the state of Perak and the center of a long and drawn

data.event: Before 1937, Taiping was the capital of the state of Perak and the center of a long and drawn out war resulting in a change of rulership for the state.
